tabs_section.title: About the company and service
tabs_section.us_description: Argon Co., Ltd. owns a chain of leading wedding, event and conference centers with luxurious, sophisticated architecture, class standards and the most professional quality service in Hanoi. Ensuring servicing from 100 guests to 1500 guests, Argon centers are suitable for organizing a variety of events. Argon system offers you convenient services including: Wedding Party Service, Conference Service - Workshop, Outside Catering Banquet Service, Birthday Party Service, Wedding Planner Service.
tabs_section.history_description: With the first establishment established in 1975, Argon now marks with 10 event centers, weddings located in prime locations in the city center. The future we continue to expand into cities across the country like Ho Chi Minh or new places of interest that fit many different market needs of guests. We always put prestige and responsibility first. With after-sales services for regular customers, we have more special offers.

carousel.slide2: Dramatic stage storing hundreds of years of memories!

gift.text2: Book a party today to receive the offer
gift.text4: on the occasion of the holiday
gift.text6: From March 8 to April 1, 2019, you only need to deposit a party with the number of over 100 guests at Argon Cau Giay, in addition to the preferential 20%, customers will be given 01 set of high-class Minh Long ceramic dishes.

wedding_service.title: Event center Argon is designed in the style: luxurious, modern, sophisticated combined with the space of banquet rooms, conference rooms - diverse workshops, serving from 100 guests to 1500 guests, suitable for many different types of events, class standards and professional service quality.
